snippet: FINDLAY--Stella. We mourn with our dear friend David as we remember his and Stella's magical love story. We loved Stella's pluck, adventurousness, sense of humor, and dedication to children James, Alex and Bruce. She was a special, valiant person. Along with all who knew Stella, we adored her. Leslie and Ken Zuckerbrot 1/3
lead_paragraph: FINDLAY--Stella. We mourn with our dear friend David as we remember his and Stella's magical love story.
